metadata.titleEn: The 7000 years of isotope and geochemical data of the Puruogangri Ice Sheet (2000)
metadata.titleCn: 普若岗日冰盖7000年同位素和地球化学数据（2000）
metadata.description:
This data set comprises the oxygen isotope and geochemical data of two deep-drilled ice cores drilled in the Puruogangri ice sheet (33°55'N, 89°05'E, altitude: 6070 meters) in the central Tibetan Plateau in 2000. The ice core depths are 118.4 and 214.7 meters, respectively. 
Source of the data: National Centers for Environmental Information (http://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/data-access/paleoclimatology-data/datasets/ice-core) .
The data set contains 6 tables, which are the average values of 1 oxygen isotope per meter of the Puruogangri ice core, the 10-year average data of 1 oxygen isotope of the Puruogangri ice core, the average values of 2 oxygen isotope and the soluble aerosol concentrations per meter of the Puruogangri ice core, the 5-year average data of 2 oxygen isotope and aerosol concentrations of Puruogangri ice core, 10-year average data of 2 oxygen isotope and aerosol concentrations of the Puruogangri ice core, and the 100-year average values of 2 oxygen isotopic and aerosol concentrations of the Puruogangri ice core. The information on the fields is as follows:
Table 1: the average values of 1 oxygen isotope per meter of the Puruogangri ice core
Field: Field Name [Dimensions (Unit of Measure)]
Field 1: Depth [m]
Field 2: δ18° [‰]
Table 2: the 10-year average data of 1 oxygen isotope of the Puruogangri ice core
Field: Field Name [Dimensions (Unit of Measure)]
Field 1: Start time [Dimensionless]
Field 2: End time [Dimensionless]
Field 3: δ18° [‰]
Table 3: the average values of 2 oxygen isotope and soluble aerosol concentration per meter of the Puruogangri ice core
Field: Field Name [Dimensions (Unit of Measure)]
Field 1: Depth [m]
Field 2: Dust (diameter 0.63-20 um) [particles/mL]
Field 3: 18° [‰]
Field 4: F- [ppb]
Field 5: Cl- [ppb]
Field 6: SO42- [ppb]
Field 7: NO3- [ppb]
Field 8: Na+ [ppb]
Field 9: NH4+ [ppb]
Field 10: K+ [ppb]
Field 11: Mg2+ [ppb]
Field 12: Ca2+ [ppb]
Table 4: the 5-year average data of 2 oxygen isotope and aerosol concentration of the Puruogangri ice core
Field: Field Name [Dimensions (Unit of Measure)]
Field 1: Start time [Dimensionless]
Field 2: End time [Dimensionless]
Field 3: δ18° [‰]
Field 4: Accumulation [cm/yr]
Field 5: Dust (diameter 0.63-20 um) [particles/mL]
Field 6: F- [ppb]
Field 7: Cl- [ppb]
Field 8: SO42- [ppb]
Field 9: NO3- [ppb]
Field 10: Na+ [ppb]
Field 11: NH4+ [ppb]
Field 12: K+ [ppb]
Field 13: Mg2+ [ppb]
Field 14: Ca2+ [ppb]
Table 5: the 10-year average data of 2 oxygen isotope and aerosol concentrations of the Puruogangri ice core
Field: Field Name [Dimensions (Unit of Measure)]
Field 1: Start time [Dimensionless]
Field 2: End time [Dimensionless]
Field 3: δ18° [‰]
Field 4: Dust (diameter 0.63-20 um) [particles/mL]
Field 5: F- [ppb]
Field 6: Cl- [ppb]
Field 7: SO42- [ppb]
Field 8: NO3- [ppb]
Field 9: Na+ [ppb]
Field 10: NH4+ [ppb]
Field 11: K+ [ppb]
Field 12: Mg2+ [ppb]
Field 13: Ca2+ [ppb]
Table 6: the 100-year average values of 2 oxygen isotopic and aerosol concentrations of the Puruogangri ice core
Field: Field Name [Dimensions (Unit of Measure)]
Field 1: The last year of the interval [Dimensionless]
Field 2: δ18° [‰]
Field 3: Dust (diameter 0.63-20 um) [particles/mL]
Field 4: F- [ppb]
Field 5: Cl- [ppb]
Field 6: SO42- [ppb]
Field 7: NO3- [ppb]
Field 8: Na+ [ppb]
Field 9: NH4+ [ppb]
Field 10: K+ [ppb]

Field 12: Ca2+ [ppb]
metadata.descriptionCn:
本数据集为2000年在青藏高原中部普若岗日冰盖（33°55'N，89°05'E，海拔6070米）钻取的两个深孔冰芯的氧同位素和地球化学数据，冰芯深度分别为118.4和214.7米。
数据来源：National Centers for Environmental Information（http://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/data-access/paleoclimatology-data/datasets/ice-core）。

数据集包含6个数据表，分别为：普若岗日冰芯1氧同位素每米均值数据，普若岗日冰芯1氧同位素10年均值数据，普若岗日冰芯2氧同位素和可溶性气溶胶浓度每米均值数据，普若岗日冰芯2氧同位素和气溶胶浓度5年均值数据，普若岗日冰芯2氧同位素和气溶胶浓度10年均值数据，普若岗日冰芯2氧同位素和气溶胶浓度100年均值数据。字段信息如下：

数据表1：普若岗日冰芯1氧同位素每米均值数据
字段：字段名    【量纲（度量单位）】
字段1：深度    【m】
字段2：δ18O    【‰】

数据表2：普若岗日冰芯1氧同位素10年均值数据
字段：字段名    【量纲（度量单位）】
字段1：开始时间    【无量纲】
字段2：结束时间    【无量纲】
字段3：δ18O    【‰】

数据表3：普若岗日冰芯2氧同位素和可溶性气溶胶浓度每米均值数据
字段：字段名    【量纲（度量单位）】
字段1：深度    【m】
字段2：粉尘（直径0.63-20um）    【particles/mL】
字段3：18O    【‰】
字段4：F-    【ppb】
字段5：Cl-    【ppb】
字段6：SO42-    【ppb】
字段7：NO3-    【ppb】
字段8：Na+    【ppb】
字段9：NH4+    【ppb】
字段10：K+    【ppb】
字段11：Mg2+    【ppb】
字段12：Ca2+    【ppb】

数据表4：普若岗日冰芯2氧同位素和气溶胶浓度5年均值数据
字段：字段名    【量纲（度量单位）】
字段1：开始时间    【无量纲】
字段2：结束时间    【无量纲】
字段3：δ18O    【‰】
字段4：积累量    【cm/yr】
字段5：粉尘（直径0.63-20um）    【particles/mL】
字段6：F-    【ppb】
字段7：Cl-    【ppb】
字段8：SO42-    【ppb】
字段9：NO3-    【ppb】

字段13：Mg2+    【ppb】

literatureList.titleEn: Holocene climate variability archived in the Puruogangri ice cap on the central Tibetan Plateau
literatureList.referenceEn: Thompson, L.G., Yao, T.D., Davis, M.E., Mosley-Thompson, E., Mashiotta, T.A., Lin, P.N., Mikhalenko, V.N., &Zagorodnov, V.S. (2006). Holocene climate variability archived in the Puruogangri ice cap on the central Tibetan Plateau. Annals of Glaciology, 43(1), 61-69.

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the primary data collection methods used for obtaining isotope and geochemical data from ice cores?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 获取冰芯同位素和地球化学数据的主要数据收集方法有哪些？

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of isotopic and geochemical data collected from ice cores in a high-altitude region?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 高海拔地区冰芯收集的同位素和地球化学数据的特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: oxygen isotopes (δ18O), concentrations of soluble aerosols, dust, fluoride (F-), chloride (Cl-), sulfate (SO42-), nitrate (NO3-), sodium (Na+), ammonium (NH4+), potassium (K+), magnesium (Mg2+), calcium (Ca2+)
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 氧同位素（δ18O）、可溶性气溶胶浓度、尘埃、氟化物（F-）、氯化物（Cl-）、硫酸盐（SO42-）、硝酸盐（NO3-）、钠（Na+）、铵（NH4+）、钾（K+）、镁（Mg2+）、钙（Ca2+）

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many data tables are included in a dataset related to ice core isotopes and geochemical data from the Puruogangri Ice Cap?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 与普若岗里冰盖的冰芯同位素和地球化学数据相关的数据集中包含多少个数据表？

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of utilizing high-resolution isotopic and geochemical data from ice cores on our understanding of paleoclimate patterns over the past 7000 years?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 利用来自冰芯的高分辨率同位素和地球化学数据对我们理解过去7000年的古气候模式的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Utilizing high-resolution isotopic and geochemical data from ice cores can lead to a more detailed understanding of paleoclimate patterns, allowing researchers to reconstruct past climate conditions with greater accuracy. This can reveal insights into historical temperature variations, atmospheric compositions, and changes in precipitation patterns over the past 7000 years.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 利用来自冰芯的高分辨率同位素和地球化学数据，可以更详细地理解古气候模式，使研究人员能够更准确地重建过去的气候条件。这可以揭示过去7000年间历史温度变化、大气成分和降水模式变化的见解。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to collect oxygen isotope and geochemical data from ice cores in central Tibetan Plateau ice caps?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 为什么从中央青藏 Plateau 冰盖中收集氧同位素和地球化学数据是重要的？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Collecting oxygen isotope and geochemical data from ice cores in central Tibetan Plateau ice caps is crucial for understanding past climate conditions over the last 7000 years. This information can provide insights into historical temperature fluctuations, atmospheric composition, and changes in environmental conditions, contributing to broader climate change research and modeling.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 收集中央青藏 Plateau 冰盖的氧同位素和地球化学数据对于理解过去7000年的气候条件至关重要。这些信息可以提供对历史温度波动、大气成分和环境条件变化的洞察，进而为更广泛的气候变化研究和建模提供贡献。
